[Just Announced] KRILLA, Stoned Level b2b HAMRO & More Billed to Perform on NYE

Posted by Brittany Prevost on November 24, 2021

TICKETS

Flag fam - y'all aren't ready for this one! FMG Collective, Undercover & Audioform just announced their biggest collaboration to date. On December 31, 2021, get ready to ring in the new year with some serious bass in yo' face! 

The aptly named event called NEW BEGINNINGS promises two bass stages, offering different experiences. The main stage "will bring an experience focused on a heavier, high-quality sound, video and lighting", while the other "will feel intimate and present a deeper, more vibey atmosphere."

This highly-anticipated event marks FMG Collective's official comeback! After a short hiatus to revaluate their past editions and reignite their spark to organize large-scale productions, their team is now ready to tackle their biggest undertaking thus far.

When the pandemic first hit, we made the decision to step down from making events until we were able to organize them to the size & magnitude we strive for. The goal of this decision was to be able to take a break, look back at all the events we’ve done & learn how we can make them better. We aim to provide this beautiful community with what it deserves & now with all this time we’ve had to reflect, we’re confident it is the perfect time to come back bigger & stronger. -FMG Collective

In addition to a soon-to-be impeccable production, partygoers can count on special performances by a whopping fifteen artists, including some much-awaited b2b sets by HAMRO and Stoned Level as well as CHEFNIER b2b MOTION SICKNESS. Check out the full lineup below - it's guaranteed to make all your bass dreams a reality!

Furthermore, AU5, a skilled artist signed with Monstercat/Subsidia Records, will be making his Ottawa debut. He shares, "if you're looking for trendy music, turn away. If you're looking to embark on a journey, come with me." We can't wait to show him how hard Canada's capital can go!

Tickets go on sale tomorrow, Thursday, November 25, 2021, at 12 p.m. here. Trust us when we say, this event will sell out! Be sure to get your ticket before it's too late. Who will we see headbanging on the dancefloor? 

***Proof of double vaccination (QR Code Preferred) required with valid ID. No refunds will be given if you buy a ticket and are not double vaxxed***

Written By Brittany Prevost
